Model.NeuralNetwork.Layers

Class OutputLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.NeuralNetwork.Layers.OutputLayer

  • public class OutputLayer
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the networks output layer
    Author:
    Nicolas Dutly

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Jama.Matrix delta
      Describes the Matrix containing the delta for each neuron (used in back-propagation) Matrix dimensions are nbOfNeurons x 1
      private Jama.Matrix error
      Describes the matrix containing the neurons error (difference squared) Matrix dimensions are nbOfNeurons x 1
      (package private) java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> mseSum 
      private int nbOfNeurons
      Describes the number of neurons in the output layer.
      private Model.NeuralNetwork.Neuron[] neurons
      Describes an array of neurons, containing the neurons in the output layer
      private HiddenLayer prevLayer
      Describes the previous layer of type HiddenLayer
      private double[] trainingOutput
      Represents the training output.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OutputLayer(HiddenLayer prevLayer)
      Creates an output layer.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void adjustLayerWeights()
      Adjusts the weights of the individual synapses using the delta calculated in
      void calculate_delta()
      Calculates the delta of the output layer using the back-propagation algorithm (Based on the gradient descent)
      Jama.Matrix getDelta()
      Getter for the output layers delta Matrix.
      double getMSE()
      Calculates the mean squared error of the outputs
      int getNbOfNeurons()
      Getter for the layer's number of neurons
      Model.NeuralNetwork.Neuron[] getNeurons()
      Getter for the output Layer's neuron array
      double[] getOutputVector()
      Returns the output layer's output, represented in an array where the first element is the output of the first neuron of the output layer, the second the second's and so on.
      void process()
      Activates each neuron in the output layer and ands the MSE to the MSE sum
      void setTrainingOutput(double[] trainingOutput)
      Specifies the layers training output

      • getOutputVector

        public double[] getOutputVector()
        Returns the output layer's output, represented in an array where the first element is the output of the first neuron of the output layer, the second the second's and so on.
        Returns:
        an array containing the neurons output

      • calculate_delta

        public void calculate_delta()
        Calculates the delta of the output layer using the back-propagation algorithm (Based on the gradient descent)
